content:
From: Matthew Fernandez <matthew.fernandez@nicta.com.au>
Hi,

Some of the bundled ROOT files in Isabelle use a directive, "global_theories." See, for example,
src/Pure/ROOT. This does not appear to be documented in the system manual. Am I missing something
here? Perhaps the omission is deliberate because this is not intended to be used in user ROOT files.

Thanks,
Matt
